home.title: Hi! I'm
home.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer based in Córdoba, Argentina

about.title: About me
about.p1: I am a simple person who loves coding and learning whatever I can.
about.p2: After having my accountant degree, I felt curious about what was programming about, so I started learning by myself and I found it fascinating. Coding is my real passion and that is why I decided to get out of my confort zone and joined the Soy Henry's bootcamp.
about.p3: I have knowledge in HTML, CSS, SASS, Bootstrap, ChakraUI, MaterialUI, Javascript, ReactJS, Redux, NodeJS, ExpressJS, Sequelize, PostgreSQL and Scrum. And I am open to learn any other technology!
about.p4: Currently I am working as remote developer for the chilean start up Canal Cero, mainly on Front-End development and support using tools and languages such as HTML, CSS, Javascript, PHP, Elementor, Bricks and WooCommerce.
about.p5: I am a highly creative person. I love generating attractive experiences, not only visually but also functionally, paying special attention on details. I like being part of a team because I can learn from my teammates and bring my knowledge in order to achieve goals.

projects.title: Projects
projects.project1-tecnologies: HTML5, CSS, Javascript, Bootstrap, MaterialUI, ReactJs, Redux, NodeJs, ExpressJs, Sequelize, PostgreSQL, Auth0, JWT, Stripe, Nodemailer
projects.project1-description: E-commerce platform created as a team final project for Soy Henry's Bootcamp. We created our own information to use as an API. You can search, order and filter products, add them to favorites or add them to the cart and buy. Also you can modify the information or ban users if you have administrator permissions.
projects.project2-tecnologies: HTML5, CSS, Javascript, ReactJs, Redux, NodeJs, ExpressJs, Sequelize, PostgreSQL
projects.project2-description: Single Page Application where you can search, filter, order countries and create touristic activities.
projects.project3-description: Single Page Application where you can search the weather from a specific city. It was made during Soy Henry's Bootcamp while we were learning ReactJs, and we used Open Weather API. I made some changes and added styles using Chakra UI.
projects.project4-description: This was my first project with HTML and CSS. It's a landing page tribute to the band. You can find information about the artists, their discography and pictures.
projects.project6-tecnologies: Wordpress, Elementor Pro, HTML5, CSS, Javascript
projects.project6-description: Olatrek is a company that organizes and manages trips to marathons. This was my first freelance project using Wordpress and making the complete development process of the site, from choosing the technology to the deployment. The design was made by Pilar Igarzábal.
projects.project7-tecnologies: Wordpress, Elementor Pro, HTML5, CSS, SASS, Javascript
projects.project8-tecnologies: Wordpress, Bricks Builder, HTML5, CSS, Javascript
projects.project8-description: Wordpress website for Triumph Modular company.
projects.project9-tecnologies: Wordpress, Bricks Builder, HTML5, CSS, Javascript
projects.project9-description: Multilingual Wordpress website for Friosur company.
projects.project10-tecnologies: Wordpress, Bricks Builder, HTML5, CSS, Javascript
projects.project10-description: Multilingual Wordpress website for El Loa Airport. It is connected with their flights API and OpenWeatherMap API for the weather on the navigation bar.
